title: Google Home app becomes even more handy with new smart home automations
description: The Google Home app is getting nine new starters and actions.

title: Nothing OS 2.0 is starting to rollout to the Nothing Phone 1
description: The update will add new features, improved functionality, and more customization.

title: The Galaxy Watch 5 Bespoke Edition just hit an all-time low price
description: It's your first chance to pick up this model of the Galaxy Watch 5 for under $180.

title: Nothing’s CMF smartwatch, earbuds, and more leak, could launch next month
description: Nothing's CMF smartwatch may not run on Wear OS.

title: First chance to score savings on the new OnePlus Pad
description: The hot new tablet from OnePlus is now down to just $429.99.

title: Galaxy S23 FE has been sitting at the FCC since May and just gained approval
description: The Galaxy S23 FE has been in testing for months.

title: I could live with a slower chip in the Samsung Galaxy S24
description: Just don't limit Snapdragon processors to certain countries, please.

title: We asked, you told us: Some of you have filthy wearables
description: The big question is whether wearing your tracker or watch in the shower counts as cleaning it.

title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra could get a brighter display, but ditch the curves
description: This could be the first time in close to a decade where we won't have a top Samsung flagship with a curved display.

title: Realme GT 5 launched: This phone has a Burning Mode
description: The GT5's Burning Mode delivers top speeds when paired with a cooling fan.

title: Google Messages could bring satellite texting to 150+ countries at launch
description: Garmin could provide satellite-based emergency response services for users of Google Messages.

title: Apple could really spruce up the next iPad Pro: M3 chip, OLED, and more expected
description: A revamped Magic Keyboard could make the new iPad Pro more closely resemble a traditional laptop.
